snippet: Backers of a ballot measure to cut California's public pensions, which was seen as a model for other states, abandoned their campaign to win voter support on Friday after a court ruling....

headline.print_headline: California Pension Reform Measure Abandoned After Court Ruling
headline.main: California Pension Reform Measure Abandoned After Court Ruling

lead_paragraph: Backers of a ballot measure to cut California's public pensions, which was seen as a model for other states, abandoned their campaign to win voter support on Friday after a court ruling.
